column5: Hi all,  Yup...another Jack report...lol.  He loves being out in the boat but fishing is definitely not the focus.  Its just nice being out there with him. He is such a lovely person, great sense of humour, amazing imagination and great company...all wrapped up in a small, curly, redhead package.    <iframe width="560" height="345" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/2oMKkqFSSOc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

These memories will last a lifetime.  Good on you for taking the time to remember them.  Those pics will last a lifetime. PS. give him a couple years, and you will be amazed at how he can outfish you on any given outing.  Kids have that special touch!  cheers
Gee, you really got a soft spot for this kid, eh?    I can see why...love these reports
Always enjoy the "Jack" reports Simon.....who could'nt ??
That IS whats it's all about!!!	Nice!!
great - i like the life jacket!
That's just awesome Simon Quality time for the both of you Thanks for sharing Jacques

That is the way to forge a bond that will last a lifetime. I have allways believed that if you show them the way in their younger years,they will remember & take you with them in later years. So far this has worked with myself & my 2 adult sons. Great report & a great job being a father.
I agree.  My kids love being on the boat too.
